Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In today's news people are talking about major shake-ups and changes in the world of Australian finance. The Reserve Bank of Australia is set for its biggest overhaul in decades according to federal treasurer Jim Chalmers with recommendations to reshape the body now released. However critics have slammed the JobSeeker rate offered to Australia's most vulnerable as inadequate with calls for an increase from the current rate of $44 a day.
